item.title: 弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）在周三早些时候接受采访时表示，莫斯科已准备好在 "俄罗斯国家的存在 "受到威胁时使用核武器。
item.description:
In an interview released early Wednesday, Vladimir Putin said that Moscow is ready to use nuclear weapons in case of a threat to “the existence of the Russian state.”

This comes as he's all but certain to win another six-year term going into the upcoming presidential election. pic.twitter.com/KngoRu3VJL

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 马萨诸塞州的一个小镇斥资 60 万美元保护海岸。几天后，一场冬季风暴将其冲走

item.title: TikTok 再次发现自己的处境岌岌可危，因为华盛顿的立法者们正在推进一项可能导致在全国范围内禁止该平台的法案。以下是最新消息。
item.description:
TikTok once again finds itself in a precarious position as lawmakers in Washington move forward with a bill that could lead to a nationwide ban on the platform. Here’s the latest. pic.twitter.com/0tE6GZPS7P

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 伊万-麦克格雷格（Ewan McGregor）希望 "也许有一天 "能重返欧比-旺-克诺比（Obi-Wan Kenobi）的角色。他与妻子玛丽-伊丽莎白-温斯特德（Mary Elizabeth Winstead）共同主演了新片《莫斯科绅士》（A Gentleman in Moscow）。
item.description:
Ewan McGregor hopes to return to his Obi-Wan Kenobi role "maybe one day." He stars in the new film "A Gentleman in Moscow" alongside his wife Mary Elizabeth Winstead. pic.twitter.com/HayFU9nQWO

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 13, 2024

item.title: 说到特技，《堕落天使》（The Fall Guy）的主演艾米莉-布朗特（Emily Blunt）说，她喜欢打斗场面，但对高度不太适应。这在《玛丽-波平斯归来》中就是个问题。
item.description:
When it comes to stunts, "The Fall Guy" star Emily Blunt says she loves fight scenes but isn't so comfortable with heights. That was a problem on "Mary Poppins Returns." pic.twitter.com/vj4fv7aZLq

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国国会众议院周三通过了一项法案，如果流行视频应用 TikTok 的中国所有者不出售该应用，将在全国范围内禁用该应用，因为议员们担心该公司目前的所有权结构会对国家安全构成威胁。
item.description:
The House passed a bill on Wednesday that would lead to a nationwide ban of the popular video app TikTok if its China-based owner doesn’t sell, as lawmakers acted on concerns that the company’s current ownership structure is a national security threat. pic.twitter.com/2HYMWk4RAK

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 13, 2024
